antialiasing.name: Antialiasing
antialiasing.description: Enables MSAA antialiasing to improve visual quality. Doesn't work on macOS. Requires restart

fast-alt-tab.name: Fast Alt Tab
fast-alt-tab.description: Disables saving when minimizing the game

force-rgba8888.name: Force RGBA8888
force-rgba8888.description: Makes the game always load textures as RGBA8888 instead of RGBA4444 to improve visual quality. Doesn't work on macOS. Requires texture reload
